column4: Intel downplays report of interest in Broadcom
column5: Microchip maker Intel Corp  responded to a news report that it is considering a possible bid for Broadcom Ltd  by saying that it is focused on integrating previous acquisitions  raising doubt over the idea.

column4: UPDATE 3-Intel downplays report of interest in Broadcom
column5: March 9 Microchip maker Intel Corp responded to a news report that it is considering a possible bid for Broadcom Ltd by saying that it is focused on integrating previous acquisitions  raising doubt over the idea.
